name: Formation Link Management Drills
description: C2 walkthroughs that keep constellation formations coherent when dozens of hulls share contested spectrum.

cards.title: Spectrum Allocation Rehearsal
cards.description: Re-plan primary, alternate, contingency, and emergency (PACE) link allocations for a 30-ship formation when coalition partners join mid-mission.
bulletpoints: Update spectrum manager with new load
cards.summaryText: PACE refreshes keep formations from stepping on each other's beams when the stack grows fast.

cards.title: Link Budget Hot-Wash
cards.description: Audit RF link budgets after solar weather advisories to confirm each hull still carries 3 dB margin at the edge of formation geometry.
bulletpoints: Issue reroute order if margins collapse
cards.summaryText: Small link budget drifts compound across a fleet; catch them before guidance complains.

cards.title: Mission Thread Chokepoint Drill
cards.description: Walk the entire mission thread to expose single points of failure in relay sequencing and design alternate hops in under 15 minutes.
bulletpoints: Trace data path from sensor to shooter
Document swap orders in C2 log
cards.summaryText: Fleet commanders rehearse thread resiliency so an isolated jammer never bricks targeting.

cards.title: Cross-Delta ROE Sync
cards.description: Align comms rules of engagement and reporting priorities when multiple Deltas cohabit the same battlespace.
bulletpoints: Publish time hacks for SITREP windows
cards.summaryText: Shared formations collapse when ROE differs by Delta; sync it daily.

cards.title: Dynamic Routing Sandbox
cards.description: Use the formation simulator to reroute high-priority traffic through three alternate paths within five minutes of a link loss.
bulletpoints: Push new tables to watch floor
cards.summaryText: Commanders that practice dynamic routing never wait on software to save their SATCOM mesh.

cards.title: Collision/Comms Deconfliction
cards.description: Overlay ephemeris and link schedules to ensure proximity operations never violate pointing constraints or fratricide envelopes.
bulletpoints: Cross-check maneuver plans with COMSEC windows
Coordinate with safety officer for waivers
cards.summaryText: Formation safety is half orbital math, half comms choreographyâ€”treat both as one.
